page.title: 19Clubs - Scouts and Camps
page.content: THERE ARE 2 SCOUT TROUPS, ONE OF WHICH IS CONNECTED TO ST. COLMAN'S CHURCH AND A GIRLS BRIGADE COMPANY ATTACHED TO KILKEEL PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH. MOURNE FREE PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH HAS A YOUTH FELLOWHSIP WHICH MEETS ON FRIDAY EVENINGS AND INVOLVES THE CHILDREN IN BIBLE STUDY. DURING JULY AND AUGUST MANY CHILDREN FROM OTHER AREAS VISIT KILKEEL TO EITHER CAMP OR STAY IN ONE OF THE GUEST HOUSES OR LOCAL SCHOOLS. YOUTH SOCCER AND TENNIS COMPETITIONS ARE ORGANISED THROUGHOUT THE SUMMER, AND THESE ARE WELL SUPPORTED. WITH THE NATURAL AMENITIES ALL TASTES ARE USUALLY PROVIDED FOR.
